definition: Wong Kam-po (1973-), Hong Kong champion cyclist
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Golden cowrie shells are among the hardest shells to find and are prized by collectors.
sentences.chinese: 黃金寶螺的貝殼極難找到，它們爲收藏家所推崇。
